name: Virus Force
description:
Virus Force is a high risk high reward arcade twin-stick shooter. Increase your score multiplier dramatically by resisting the urge to clear the playfield of all enemies. 

You play as a white blood cell doing its best job to scatter antibodies all over invading viruses. 

I hope you enjoy this small game. I had a ton of fun making it and am excited to share it. Made with Unreal Engine 4.
